attributes.action: provide free school meals to all children from working families who are in reciept of any form of tax credits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of the current MP's expenses scandal, the provision of free school meals for all children (initially for those parents on low incomes and in receipt of any form of tax credit if neccesary) would, go along way in repairing the damage done between government (who have claimed for anything and everything) and the electorate.
 The cost of which could be met partially, by any savings - which surely will be made by those same MP's now that they will be under greater scrutiny.
